application for federal loans is`` moving ahead'' and will not be affected too much by proposed cuts in the Obama administration's budget, the head of the U.S. Department of Energy said on Monday. .`` We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' said Eric Schmidt , who joined Google as CEO in 2001. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Despite Google's solid results for 2010, Larry Page and Sergey Brin may feel Eric Schmidt isn't adequately addressing the challenges the company faces. $ 2.54 billion in the fourth quarter of 2010 from$ 1.97 billion in the same quarter a year ago. Revenue was up 26 per cent to$ 8.44 billion from the same period last year. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.
